sql.query: SELECT D.Year, I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Value, E.UnitName{{LANG}} FROM Data AS D, Element E, Item I, Domain DO WHERE D.DomainCode IN ('GT', 'GE') AND D.DomainCode = DO.DomainCode AND D.AreaCode IN ({{AREACODE}}) AND D.ElementCode IN ('7231', '72314') AND D.ItemCode IN ('1711', '1126') AND D.ElementCode = E.ElementCode AND D.ItemCode = I.ItemCode AND D.Year >= {{FROMYEAR}} AND D.Year <= {{TOYEAR}}  GROUP BY D.Year, I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Value, E.UnitName{{LANG}} ORDER BY I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Year, E.UnitName{{LANG}}

SELECT D.Year, I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Value, E.UnitName{{LANG}} FROM Data AS D, Element E, Item I, Domain DO WHERE D.DomainCode IN ('GT', 'GE') AND D.DomainCode = DO.DomainCode AND D.AreaCode IN ({{AREACODE}}) AND D.ElementCode IN ('7231', '72314') AND D.ItemCode IN ('1711', '1126') AND D.ElementCode = E.ElementCode AND D.ItemCode = I.ItemCode AND D.Year >= {{FROMYEAR}} AND D.Year <= {{TOYEAR}}  GROUP BY D.Year, I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Value, E.UnitName{{LANG}} ORDER BY I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Year, E.UnitName{{LANG}}

SELECT D.Year, I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Value, E.UnitName{{LANG}} FROM Data AS D, Element E, Item I, Domain DO WHERE D.DomainCode IN ('GT', 'GE') AND D.DomainCode = DO.DomainCode AND D.AreaCode IN ({{AREACODE}}) AND D.ElementCode IN ('7231', '72314') AND D.ItemCode IN ('1711', '1126') AND D.ElementCode = E.ElementCode AND D.ItemCode = I.ItemCode AND D.Year >= {{FROMYEAR}} AND D.Year <= {{TOYEAR}}  GROUP BY D.Year, I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Value, E.UnitName{{LANG}} ORDER BY I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Year, E.UnitName{{LANG}}

sql.query: SELECT D.Year, I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Value, E.UnitName{{LANG}} FROM Data AS D, Element E, Item I, Domain DO WHERE D.DomainCode IN ('GT', 'GE') AND D.DomainCode = DO.DomainCode AND D.AreaCode IN ({{AREACODE}}) AND D.ElementCode IN ('7231', '72314') AND D.ItemCode IN ('1711', '1126') AND D.ElementCode = E.ElementCode AND D.ItemCode = I.ItemCode AND D.Year >= {{FROMYEAR}} AND D.Year <= {{TOYEAR}}  GROUP BY D.Year, I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Value, E.UnitName{{LANG}} ORDER BY I.ItemName{{LANG}} + ' (' + DO.DomainName{{LANG}} + ')', D.Year, E.UnitName{{LANG}}
